text: Bonamia is a genus of the flowering plant family Convolvulaceae, commonly known as the bindweed family and named after the French physician and botanist François Bonamy (1710-1786). Members of the genus are commonly known as the lady's nightcap. ==Species== The following species are recognized in the genus Bonamia: *B. abscissa (Choisy) Hallier f. *B. agrostopolis (Vell.)
